member.name: DEVICE_WRITE_AGGREGATION_DESCRIPTOR.Version
member.summary: Contains the size, in bytes, of this structure. The value of this member will change as members are added to the structure.

member.name: DEVICE_WRITE_AGGREGATION_DESCRIPTOR.Size
member.summary: Specifies the total size of the descriptor, in bytes.

member.name: DEVICE_WRITE_AGGREGATION_DESCRIPTOR.BenefitsFromWriteAggregation
member.summary: TRUE if the device benefits from write aggregation.
